metadata.dc:author: de Angel Yágüez, R
metadata.dc:description: This paper serves a twin aim: firstly, to examine in detail and give an opinion on the ruling of the Supreme Court of 4 February 1999, and secondly, given the contradiction between this ruling and a previous one handed down by the same court (6 June 1997), to set out a number of considerations on the problem addressed in both cases.
metadata.dc:title: La segunda sentencia dictada por la Sala Primera del Tribunal Supremo en un caso de wrongful birth (4 de Febrero de 1999). Está en contradicción con lo resuelto en la sentencia de 6 de Junio de 1997 sobre el mismo problema?

[The second decision pronounced by the First Tribunal of the Supreme Court in a case of wrongful birth (February 4, 1999). Does it contradict the resolution of the decision pronounced on June 6, 1997 about the same problem?].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista de derecho y genoma humano = Law and the human genome review
